mapper.insert: insert into dish(id, name, category_id, price, image, description, status, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user) values (null, #{name}, #{categoryId}, #{price}, #{image}, #{description}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser})
mapper.select: select id, name, category_id categoryId, price, image, description, status, create_time createTime, update_time updateTime, create_user createUser, update_user updateUser from dish where id = #{id}

select d.id, d.name, d.category_id, d.price, d.image, d.description, d.status, d.create_time, d.update_time, d.create_user, d.update_user, df.id flavorId, df.dish_id flavorDishId, df.name flavorName, df.value flavorValue from dish d left join dish_flavor df on d.id = df.dish_id where d.id = #{id}

select d.id, d.name, d.category_id, d.price, d.image, d.description, d.status, d.create_time, d.update_time, d.create_user, d.update_user, df.id flavorId, df.dish_id flavorDishId, df.name flavorName, df.value flavorValue from dish d left join dish_flavor df on d.id = df.dish_id where d.category_id = #{categoryId}
